fi.jumi.api.drivers

Interface TestNotifier


  • public interface TestNotifier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fireFailure(Throwable cause)
      Notifies about a test failure.
      void fireTestFinished()
      Notifies about the end of a test execution.

    • Method Detail

      • fireFailure

        void fireFailure(Throwable cause)
        Notifies about a test failure.

        The test will fail if this method is called at least once,[citation needed] otherwise the test will pass.[citation needed]

        May be called multiple times.[citation needed] Must be called on the current test,[1][2] i.e. the latest TestNotifier which is not yet finished.

        References:
        [1]: fireFailure_must_be_called_on_the_current_test,
        [2]: fireFailure_cannot_be_called_after_the_test_is_finished

      • fireTestFinished

        void fireTestFinished()
        Notifies about the end of a test execution.

        Must be called last, exactly once.[1] Must be called on the current test,[2] i.e. the latest TestNotifier which is not yet finished.

        References:
        [1]: fireTestFinished_cannot_be_called_after_the_test_is_finished,
        [2]: fireTestFinished_must_be_called_on_the_current_test
